jd:
From: Suresh, Tech Rakers sureshk@techrakers.com Reply to: sureshk@techrakers.com Title: Sr. Project Manager
Location: Austin, TX – 100% remote (Need to live in Texas, No relocation candidates)
Duration: 12 months + (Potential for extension)

Job Description:
We are looking for a Sr. Project Manager with at least 8+ years of IT experience. An ideal candidate will have previous State Agency/ Government domain experience.

100% Remote, but MUST BE a TEXAS Resident. Need Sr. Project Managers with previous State or Federal government experience.

Desired Experience/ Requirements:
- At least 8+ years of Project Management Experience for large-scale Enterprise Implementations
- Domain experience with State of Texas or Similar Federal/State Project Management Experience
- Experience with Project Management - leading and managing legacy modernization project
- Experience with low code/no code solution
- Nice to have - Experience with Texas Statewide systems
- Nice to have - Knowledge of State of Texas QAT process for major Information Resources project (MIRP)
